channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Acts Of Vengeance
channel.desc: Action, Drama, Thriller 2017 A lawyer, driven by the brutal murder of his wife and daughter, swears an oath of absolute silence. He will not speak again until he has identified and punished their killers, dedicating himself entirely to vengeance. Antonio Banderas, Karl Urban, Paz Vega, Clint Dyer, Mark Rhino Smith, Isaac Florentine, Matt Venne.
